name: Web Development
description: Create responsive, high-performance websites using modern technologies like React, Node.js, Laravel, and Vue.js. We focus on delivering user-friendly interfaces and robust backends.

name: IoT Solutions
description: Offering IoT solutions that connect your devices and provide seamless automation for smarter living. We handle the entire process from hardware integration to software development.

name: E-commerce Solutions
description: Develop scalable e-commerce platforms with integrated payment gateways, inventory management, and customer analytics to boost your online sales.

name: Cloud Solutions
description: Leverage AWS and other cloud platforms to scale your business efficiently. From serverless computing to data storage, we help optimize your cloud infrastructure.
